description:
Control all your speakers, group rooms to play in sync, and quickly search for music and more.

Sonos S2 is a new app and operating system (OS) that will power the next generation of Sonos products and experiences.

Take listening to the next level with Sonos S2. This new generation of the app features support for higher resolution audio, an improved design, increased security, and smarter software to keep your system up to date.
